<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
BadTypeKeyword occurs when a .(type) expression is used anywhere other
than a type switch.

Example:
 type I interface {
 	m()
 }
 var t I
 var _ = t.(type)
```
